title: Establishes a Haitian Earthquake victims survivor college scholarship program for children and spouses injured in the January twelfth, two thousand ten earthquake
summary: Establishes a Haitian Earthquake victims survivor college scholarship program for persons and children or spouses of persons who survived the January twelfth, two thousand ten earthquake in Haiti.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a Haitian Earthquake victims survivor college scholarship program for children and spouses of persons injured in the January twelfth, two thousand ten earthquake in Haiti
